info.name: NationStates Dark Theme
info.description:
This is basically a darker theme for NationStates.

More screenshots:
Forum: http://i.imgur.com/pl0k4.png
Thread: http://i.imgur.com/N8tF3.png
Nation Page: http://i.imgur.com/08ytl.png
World Assembly: http://i.imgur.com/OK5hR.png
The World: http://i.imgur.com/kiIVk.png
info.additionalInfo:
09/24/11
- Removed background, paperclip, and nation flag pictures, realigned text, reduced the sizes of the input boxes, and changed font on Settings page.

08/23/11
- Fixed problem where the Embassies Cancelled table was still in its original colors.

08/22/11
- Darkened background of table where "code" BBcode is displayed.
- Changed thread page numbers (these show up where there are lists of threads) to be darker.

08/21/11
- Fixed problem with using the "pre code" BBcode where the background and text would both be white.
- Replaced the Liberal and Conservative picture banners for their respective themes with the transparent NS picture because of too much brightness.

08/08/11
- Changed font color to allow characters previously used as hidden spacing (users used to make the font the same color as background to do this)

08/07/11
- Darkened backgrounds of nation lists (daily census), regional message boards, and world assembly resolutions
- Removed globe in upper right hand corner on nation page
- Changed color scheme of form at the bottom of the page where posts are inputted and the bar at the bottom of every forum page where posts/threads are filtered

08/06/11
- Fixed problem in Chrome where submit buttons were entirely black

07/23/11
- Removed bright WA logo from left navigation bar on Nation Page 
- Changed color scheme on the info box that appears when posting or answering issues
